name: Beaneth the Earth
description:
Beaneth the Earth.

Amongst the craze of cutting edge AI, Bintel™ has released their new chatbot, Bintel™ Chat. You've been selected as a beta tester. Hooray!

Gameplay

Place towers to fight off an invasion. Can you keep your castle safe and cleanse the map?


Spend your hard-earned energy to place towers anywhere within range of the castle. The 5 types of defenses are:

  • Wall - Slows enemies down.
  • Cleanser - Fends off the spread of bean corruption.
  • Tank - Fends off bean warriors.
  • Powerplant - Increases energy production (to purchase further defenses).
  • Range tower - Increases range at which you can place new towers.
Attributions
  • Towers from the hexagonal tilemap from Unity Learn: https://learn.unity.com/tutorial/working-with-hexagonal-and-isometric-tile-shape...
  • Bean sprite generated by DALL-E.
  • Game Over screen generated by Midjourney.
  • All other assets (including music and sounds!) were designed by the team.
